entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0004.9289] [Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities] with a value of -261,670 is not equal to the combined total of [Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations] and Net cash provided by operating activities from discontinued operations ( -226,493 + 35,177 ) with a value of -191,316.
These values should be equal. The properties of this us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities fact are: Period :2022-01-01 to 2022-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of [Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities] : 0 Decimals of [Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations] : 0 Decimals of Net cash provided by operating activities from discontinued operations : 0
